definitions.title: n.
definitions.body: [[[מ]]:] flax, linen (√ dub.; NH [[פִּשְׁתָּן]], Pun. foist; Löw:p. 233);—sf. [[פִּשְׁתִּי]] Ho 2:7, Ho 2:11; elsewhere pl. [[פִּעשׁתִּים]] Ju Jdg 15:14 +, cstr. [[פִּשְׁתֵּי]] Jos 2:6; —
flax, after gathering, [[פִּשְׁתֵּי הָעֵץ]] Jos 2:6 (JE, v. [[עֵץ]]

definitions.title: 2 f
definitions.body: ); inflammable Ju Jdg 15:14 (sim.); as natural product (+ [[עֶמֶר]]) Ho 2:7, Ho 2:11; as material, ´[[פְּתִיל פ]] Ez Eze 40:3; of various garments Je 13:1, Ez Eze 44:17, Eze 44:18, Eze 44:18, + [[חֶמֶר]] De 22:11, Le 13:47, Le 13:48, Le 13:52, Le 13:59 (P), cf. Pr 31:13; [[שְׂרִיקוֹת]] ´[[עׂבְדֵי פ]] Is 19:9 (v.[[[שָׂרִיק]]]).
